p: Similarity ranges between 0 (no similarity, i.e., no common terms) and 1 (maximum similarity, i.e., identical text vectors). Cosine similarity s( d i, OS) was computed for all 532 recollections d i with respect to the original story OS. Mean similarity was M = 0.15 ( SD = 0.12; Min = 0, Max = 0.55).
